Texts.Eng: An ominous coffee-like substance for robotic consumers. ^cyan;+^reset;35%^green; Energy^reset;^red; Nightmare^reset; 180s^reset; ^blue;Madness Gain^reset; 3 ^yellow;Type: Robot Food^reset;
